price: Say, “To whom belong the earth and all those who are on it, if you really know?”
arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
